item.title: Hydraulic SYS FAULT Lights – Hydraulic Quantity Indication Operative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative provided the following indications are verified to be operative:

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard the affected Hydraulic System Fault Light: "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Required indications for the associated system are verified as follows:
Push the HYD switch on the EICAS Display Select Panel. The Hydraulic Synoptic Page will come into view on the Auxiliary EICAS screen.
Pressurize the associated system and verify the following indications on the Hydraulic Synoptic Page:
Verify hydraulic quantity is 0.75 to 1.15 full (fraction of total capacity).
